title: Script font would have a clue what it is need help ASAP
content:
Hi,

Could some one please be able to tell me what the following font is ASAP as I have to get something done with it but have only been given a jpg. Would appreciate our help.

V

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202015-01-04%20at%208_6395.59.17%20AM.png)

Font: 

 Bombshell Pro 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153049/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: vlaverick

comments.content:
Bombshell Pro, with an alternate swash glyph for the |b|:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153049/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/bombshell-pro/")
Thank you for your help :) appreciate it greatly :)
